description: Celebrating the ability to play games together wherever you are, Valve has launched the Steam Remote Play Together 2024 Fest. Giving you plenty of discounts on games you might want to pick up.
title: Steam Remote Play Together 2024 Fest is live to celebrate gaming together anywhere

description: Want to get Linux on your Lenovo Legion Go? Bazzite Linux was recently updated and now should be feature complete for the Legion Go so you can get a more SteamOS-like experience for it just like the Steam Deck.
title: Bazzite Linux adds support for the Lenovo Legion Go handheld

description: Motion Twin have announced that the upcoming Update 35 for Dead Cells will be the end, so it will be actually finished and complete with no more content updates.
title: Dead Cells will be finished with the upcoming Update 35

description: Hitting Early Access on February 19th, Craftomation 101 is a spiritual successor to Luden.io's previous game "while True: learn()" and it sounds like a really fun combination of ideas.
title: Craftomation 101 combines crafting, programming and tiny robots to unfreeze a planet

description: Sokobond Express is a beautifully minimalist puzzle game that combines chemical bonds and puzzling pathfinding in novel ways. The developers say it's a bit of a mashup of the ideas from Sokobond and Cosmic Express.
title: Puzzle game Sokobond Express releases February 22nd

description: Two new versions of GE-Proton have been released pulling in some extra fixes for various games for Steam Deck / Linux, so here's what's new and improved.
title: GE-Proton 8-31 and 8-32 bring fixes for Helldivers 2, Dark and Darker, Agarest

description: If you want to grab games from GOG on Linux and Steam Deck (or even macOS and Windows), there's some good news for you. The Heroic Games Launcher just released version 2.13 which brings with it their overhaul to GOG support.
title: Heroic Games Launcher v2.13 brings GOG support improvements
